Package com.jgoodies.binding.extras

Contains optional classes that ship only with the source distribution.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DelayedWriteValueModel
    A ValueModel that defers write-access for a specified delay.
    FastPropertyAccessorProviderDraft
    Provides a faster lookup for PropertyAccessors compared to the Introspection-based default PropertyAccessorProvider.
    NonNullValueModel
    A ValueModel implementation that avoids null values.

Package com.jgoodies.binding.extras Description

Contains optional classes that ship only with the source distribution. The API of these classes is work in progress and may change without notice. The classes may even be completely removed from future versions of the Binding library. If you want to use a class from this package, you may consider copying it into your code base.

Related Documentation

For more information see:
  • ValueModels explained
  • http://www.jgoodies.com/articles/binding.pdf
See Also:
com.jgoodies.binding.adapter, com.jgoodies.binding.beans, com.jgoodies.binding.list, com.jgoodies.binding.value
